full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 120 of 261 1281
LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross
1 Q. Being a music coach or a music therapist, are you employed in the music industry?
2 A. I mean, that is the music industry.
3 Q. So you are employed in that capacity?
4 A. I'm employed -- I mean I work in that capacity and I get paid in that capacity.
5 Q. And you are selfemployed; correct?
6 A. Yes.
7 Q. But a U visa would permit you to be in other areas than music; correct?
8 A. I don't know.
9 Q. And a U visa is not something that you can buy; correct?
10 A. I don't know.
11 Q. It's something that you need the government to attest to the fact that you claim to be a victim; correct?
12 A. I'm not sure of the requirements.
13 Q. You have no idea?
14 A. I don't know what the requirements are, no.
15 MS. STERNHEIM: Just a moment.
16 Nothing further. Thank you.
17 THE COURT: Ms. Pomerantz.
18 MS. POMERANTZ: Your Honor, would this be a good time for a break?
19 THE COURT: I guess it depends on how long you anticipate.
20 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
21 DOJ-OGR-00012871
